column3: Faculty of Environmental and Life Sciences
column5: Explore Clinical Psychology at a global top 100* university.Start your career in clinical psychology and learn the key therapy skills required of a clinical psychologist such as counselling and Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT).You'll learn how to combine research and methodology to treat patients worldwide, whilst exploring and assessing the service provision of clinical psychology in the UK and internationally.You'll graduate with the transferable skills and confidence required to step into the real world and pursue a career in psychology.Our MSc is recognised by the British Psychological Society (BPS) as counting towards continued professional development.
